subtitleNullable: crypto and nft related tweets and sentiments for NLP, market trends, etc
descriptionNullable:
NO MORE UPDATES
[nitter.net](https://nitter.net) the twitter mirror we were pulling from has shutdown indefinitely.

* this is a twitter tweet dataset on crypto, nfts, exchanges, and popular forums like wallstreetbets  
* pulling tweets live from twitter ~3-4 days worth of tweets from the marked date of the files  


## search queries in `_q.csv`
this file contains all the queries for different cryptocurrencies and exchanges / forums that were searching on twitter to gather the data.

## tweets `yymmdd.*` files
- these are the tweets data files
- note they are marked sol and binance but they contain results from all queries

## columns
```
|-------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|
| field                   | explanation                                           |
|-------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|
| username                | who posted the tweet                                  |
|-------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|
| tweet_raw               | unfiltered tweets *have links whitespace special chs. |
|-------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|
| tweet_text              | cleaned tweet text                                    |
|-------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|
| date                    | date tweet was posted                                 |
|-------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|
| happy/sad/etc           | these are emotion / sentiment scoring                 |
|-------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|
| afinn/bing/sid/bertweet | more sentiment scoring                                |
|-------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|
```
title: crypto nft tweets data
subtitle: crypto and nft related tweets and sentiments for NLP, market trends, etc

## search queries in `_q.csv`

